attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to a recent "rise" in knife/gun crime people have become fearful of youth.
the police forces of the uk supposedly there to fight crime and sort problems have begun to attack the young people of this society.
Stopping and searching very aggresively, using violence and snide remarks.
Wrongfully arresting many youth.
Harassing young people at train stations, in the street and at school.

Put a stop to this waste of tax-payer money, where real crime is being overlooked in favour of "youth-crime".

Sign this permission to prompt this government to rethink policy and change the way that the police forces are BULLYING youth.
